Reviews.Title: “ExcEllEnt budgEt hotEl”
Reviews.Author: Mike K
Reviews.Content: This is an excellenT budgeT hoTel. the owners were professional, courteous, knowledgable, and very good hosts. The rooms were clean and well mainTained. this hotel offers an excellent value for your money. Definitely, I will stay here again. stay away from the street if you are a light sleeper.

Reviews.Title: “The Best Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Neisa N
Reviews.Content: I stayed six times in dreams hotel and was always excellent, the owner Elena and her husband are the best persons i ever know. they make you feel at home. they give you advice every time you need something. The rooms are always clean. The place is well located. And the best thing is that i feel save in the hotel and the streets around that. Deams hotel for ever Vanessa

Reviews.Title: “Perfect name for the hotel”
Reviews.Author: Chuchita C
Reviews.Content: My son and daughter recently stayed at Dreams. Their experience was one of a kind. They found the hotel very clean and cozy. The owners were extremely friendly; in fact, one of the owners drove my children, on his personal time and vehicle, to where they needed to go and brought them back to the hotel. Being first time visitors, to Puerto Rico, it was extremely important to find a hotel in a well located area with a decent price and this was it. I will recommend this hotel to anybody that's looking for a safe, clean, and reasonable accommodation and I look forward to staying there, myself, in the future. Keep up the good work and thank you for the kindness shown to my children. Norma Flores, Hugo Mora, Xochitl Flores

Reviews.Title: “Great value and friendly service!”
Reviews.Author: Betty317
Reviews.Content: Stayed just one night but had a very nice experience. The room and bathroom were super clean! The staff was very friendly and helpful. Will return and recommend to friends :)

Reviews.Title: “Whats the complaint?”
Reviews.Author: jlgs5326
Reviews.Content: It makes me sick to read of people complaining about the noise, traffic, access, etc if you pay 60 to 70 dollars for a room what do you expect? I live in Orlando Fl and the same holds true here. Want superb service? Go to the Hyatt, HitÃ³n or pay 200.00 in some resort, I assure you will get what you expect and thensome, be a realist,you want top service pay top dollars, simple as that.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: APCharzie
Reviews.Content: I'm a regular visitor to Puerto Rico. I was introduced to this facility in 2010 and I must say I had a very wonderful time with my family. The rooms were very well kept clean and comfortable. It was like a home away from home. Shopping areas are very close and easy accessible. I have to compliment the management and staff for their courteous service always. Will recommend this hotel any day for a quiet and well loved vacation or otherwise. Robert and Elana will make your stay very enjoyable I can assure you.

Reviews.Title: “Nice choice.”
Reviews.Author: ramed
Reviews.Content: Managing by the owners, you can feel like home. Excellent location, good price, clean, safe and comfortable.

HotelInfo.Name: Dreams Hotel Puerto Rico
HotelInfo.Address: 109 Ave. Universidad, San Juan 00926, Puerto Rico
